Text.Page:
!

Have you heard of the Dungeon Resonance phenomenon in Baldera?

The Resonance has created gates connecting Arborea to countless dimensions.

Would you be interested in getting to the bottom of this phenomenon with me?

You learned that the world shards containing the power of the core were the reason why Arborea had become connected to other dimensions.
Obtain a Resonance Stone so that you can open the gate and defeat a level 1 boss.
Continuously level up so that you can face the challenges of even higher levels.

Isn't it amazing that there's a gate that connects Arborea with another dimension?

How great must the effects of the destroyed core be for a phenomenon like this to happen?
"I'd be interested in that too."

Good.

Here's a replica of a Resonance Stone, .

Take it to the Bloody Resonance Gate.

Watch carefully what happens. "What's a Resonance Stone?"

It works as a kind of key to open the Resonance Gate and link Arborea to other dimensions.

These stones are so important that even I don't have an original one. But I do have something very similar.

Shall we test what happens with it?

Did you notice the reaction between the Resonance Gate and the replica Resonance Stone?

Unfortunately, the replica didn't generate the full response, but I did identify one thing.

One Resonance Stone isn't enough to open the gate."So, how can the gate be opened?"

You'll have to find allies who also possess a Resonance Stone, and form a group of 5 players.

The group leader can select the difficulty at the Resonance Gate, and if every group member agrees, you can enter the dungeon.

No one knows what dungeon you'll end up in."Where can I get a Resonance Stone?"

Resonance Stones can be obtained in group dungeons.

Do you want to enter a Resonance Dungeon now?

Like I said, you'll need to form a group of 5 players. Then you'll be able to enter the dungeon via the gate.

You should start with level 1.

Go though the Bloody Gate and bring me the boss's item.

I'm impressed that you completed the dungeon within the time limit.

If you carry on diligently collecting Resonance Stones, you'll be able to attempt even higher levels.

There are, after all, an infinite number of dimensions.

FROZEN Otherworldly Shards can be obtained by completing the Resonance Dungeon (Hard) within the time limit.

Enter the Resonance Dungeon via the Bloody Resonance Gate.
